verbs.description: six reasons [ARG1: the photomath app] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [ARG2: as cool as you think it is] [ARGM-TMP: by now] you 've probably seen the amazing video about an app called photomath once you download it you can take a picture of a math problem with your phone and the app not only solves the problem it shows you how to do it step - by - step everyone seems to be talking about it how cool is that not very actually and here why dan meyer
